initialMessage.text: Hello! I'm your financial assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.spending: I can help you analyze your spending patterns. Based on your recent transactions, you've spent the most on dining and entertainment. Would you like a detailed breakdown?
responses.budget: Setting a budget is a great idea! I recommend the 50/30/20 rule: 50% for needs, 30% for wants, and 20% for savings. Would you like me to help you create a custom budget?
responses.saving: Saving money is important! Consider setting up automatic transfers to a savings account. Even small amounts add up over time. Would you like tips on how to save more?
responses.account: I can help you manage your accounts. You can view all your connected accounts, check balances, and see recent transactions. What would you like to know?
responses.default: I'm here to help with your financial questions! You can ask me about spending analysis, budgeting tips, savings strategies, or account management.
